Rare Category Detection¶

SecuML allows to explore a dataset interactively with rare category detection. It is an iterative process, where the user is asked to annotate some instances at each iteration.

SecuML_rare_category_detection <project> <dataset> --init-annotations-file <filename>

Help

SecuML_rare_category_detection -h

Graphical User Interface¶

Rare Category Detection Monitoring Interface

Rare Category Detection Annotation Interface
